Title: SAP SuccessFactors Recruitement
Description: The solution must support a job requisition process that caters for differences in teaching and non-teaching recruitment processes, including different workflow approvals and notifications.
research_analysis: 1. SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting Management's standard job requisition approval process lacks time constraints on the duration an approver can keep a job requisition pending, causing potential delays in meeting specific workflow approval deadlines for teaching and nonteaching recruitment processes within the RCM module ().

Title: SAP SuccessFactors Recruitement
Description: The solution must support the workflow of a job requisition for a teaching role to the applicable HR Business Partner for endorsement, which incorporates a review of potential transfers and teachers requiring placement before being advertised.
research_analysis: 1. SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting standard job requisition approval process lacks time binding or limitation on how long an approver can keep the job requisition pending, causing potential delays in endorsement workflows such as for teaching roles.

validation.object: Job Requisition Templates and Route Maps
validation.impact: Limited workflow flexibility specific to role types
Restricts detailed control of endorsements and reviews

Title: SAP SuccessFactors Recruitement
Description: The solution must automatically generate a unique identifier for each job requisition.
research_analysis: 1. SAP SuccessFactors automatically generates a unique identifier for each job requisition as a 32character alphanumeric string with no input parameters configurable, which limits customization of the format within Recruiting Management (RCM).

validation.impact: No customization on ID format allowed
No native audit or provenance controls on generated ID

Title: SAP SuccessFactors Recruitement
Description: The solution must automatically default the required organisational unit, job and position attributes required to complete a job requisition, including any available role description.
research_analysis: 1. No verified limitations found within the specified scope.

validation.impact: limitations on defaulting attributes due to role misconfiguration
XML errors affect default attribute population

Title: SAP SuccessFactors Recruitement
Description: The solution must allow for particular fields within the job requisition to be flagged as mandatory fields which presents the appropriate warning and error messages to the user if the job requisition is incomplete at time of submission.
research_analysis: 1. SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting Management limits the character length for certain field types, such as 100 characters for text fields, which restricts the amount of information that can be captured as mandatory fields in job requisitions, directly impacting the completeness of data input.

validation.impact: limits character length for mandatory fields
bypasses mandatory field validation for forwarded candidates
mandatory fields depend on correct template configuration
